name: Illusion
summary: Changes the appearance of the user to that of the last active Pokémon in the player's party. This illusion is broken when the Pokémon is attacked.
viability: Illusion fits in perfectly with the entire Zoroark canon. Not only that, it can completely fool opponents into a bad prediction. Have Zoroark act like a ghost-type, and then watch as the opponent uses not very effective moves. It takes a wild amount of prediction, but Illusion is the perfect signature ability for Zorua and Zoroark.
